body.name: 32 in LED Smart Compatible with Google TV, Compatible with Google TV, Google Assistant Built-in with Voice Remote, Compatible with Bluetooth, Dolby Audio Chromecast Built-in (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 15 hrs 10 mins
features: HD RESOLUTION: 1080 Full HD Resolution, experience your favorite movies and TV shows in stunning high-definition picture quality for enhanced clarity and detail.

VOICE REMOTE: With the voice remote, you can open apps, adjust the volume, and search for your favorite shows using your voice. Just press the Google Assistant button on your remote to talk to Google.
Compatible with GOOGLE TV: Browse 700,000+ movies and TV episodes, plus live TV, from across your streaming services — in one place, and organized by the genres and topics that interest you the most.
Chromecast Built-in: Works with the streaming apps you know and love: Enjoy TV shows, movies, videos, songs, games, sports and more from thousands of apps.
BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY: Wirelessly connect a compatible soundbar, headphones or stereo components to your TV. Then turn it up. Sounds like your favourite playlists sound better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for my bedroom!
reviews.reviewText: This 32-Inch 768p LED Smart TV with Google TV and it is the perfect size for my bedroom. The HD resolution provides a clear and detailed picture quality, making my favorite movies and TV shows even more enjoyable to watch. The voice remote is a great feature that allows me to control the TV with just my voice. I can easily open apps, adjust the volume, and search for shows or movies using the Google Assistant built-in. The Google TV platform is a game-changer. It brings together all my streaming services in one place, making it easy to browse and discover new content. The Chromecast built-in feature is also a plus. I can stream my favorite videos, songs, and games from thousands of apps. The Bluetooth connectivity is a nice touch too. I can connect my soundbar or headphones wirelessly and enjoy an immersive audio experience. Overall, I am extremely satisfied with this TV. It fits perfectly in my bedroom and offers a great viewing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Control and interact through voice commands
reviews.reviewText: Its built-in Alexa feature is really meaningful for me. I often mirror my iPhone 15 Pro Max to the TV for watching, but sometimes interruptions and connection issues can be frustrating. It allows me to control and interact with the TV through voice commands, freeing up my hands. It's convenient for voice searches while I'm snacking on the couch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seamless Voice Control Compatibility!
reviews.reviewText: The compatibility with Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple HomeKit is a fantastic feature. I can control my TV effortlessly using voice commands. It adds a new level of convenience to my entertainment setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seamless Bluetooth Connectivity
reviews.reviewText: I love the Bluetooth connectivity on this TV. I can easily connect my soundbar and enjoy enhanced audio quality. It's perfect for watching movies and listening to music.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Enhanced Contrast for a Better Image!
reviews.reviewText: Thanks to the Dynamic Contrast feature, the on-screen content is optimized to deliver an improved image with enhanced contrast. It brings a whole new level of visual experience to my favorite shows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Multiple HDMI Inputs for Convenience!
reviews.reviewText: With three HDMI inputs, including one with ARC, connecting my gaming consoles, set-top boxes, and AV receiver is a breeze. No more hassle of constantly switching cables. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well it works mostly
reviews.reviewText: I just needed a TV because the living room one is always occupied and this one works the Google assistant feature doesn't work I have tried repeatedly but the remote is bad for how expensive it is the whole thing should work. Other than that the video quality is ok and audio is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Voice Remote is Game Changer
reviews.reviewText: The voice remote that comes with this this TV is a game changer. It allows me to easily open apps, adjust the volume, and search for my favorite shows using my voice. Just by pressing the Google assistant button on the remote , I can talk to Google and give commands. It's so convenient and makes navigating the TV a breeze.
